preqs: Admission to School of Media, Film and Journalism, Faculty of Arts, Honours (Bachelor of Arts)

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4}

description: This unit provides a point of entry for students commencing their Honours year in the School of Media, Film and Journalism. It is designed to enable students who have majored in one of the key school disciplines ( Film and screen studies; Journalism; Communication and media studies) to engage in research methods appropriate to their disciplinary interests, and further develop the research and conceptual skills required for study at Honours level.
